name: 陳彥霖
objective: 本課程將提供系上學生兼具實務與理論之課程特色及專業實務訓練，以強化本系學生對於嵌入式系統軟硬體技術的認識與實作能力，其內容包括： （１）嵌入式系統開發環境建置 （２）嵌入式作業系統與各種自由軟體授權模式簡介 （３） UML於嵌入式軟體工程應用與CMMI標準（４）開放源碼之圖形化介面函式庫與視覺處理函示庫（５）智慧型手持行動裝置 （6）異質多核心平台之開發
schedule:
1. Introduction of Embedded Software(1 week)
2. Introduction of Embedded Operating Systems and Embedded Software 3. Engineering (2 weeks)
4. UML for Embedded Software Engineering and CMMI (2 weeks)
5. Setup Environment of Embedded Development Platform (1 week)
6. Embedded Linux Programming with Qt GUI tools(1 week)
7. Midterm Project (1 week)
8. Porting Embedded OS and Qt graphical user interface onto Embedded Development Platform (2 weeks)
9. Software Development on Heterogeneous (ARM-DSP) Multi-core Embedded Platforms (2 weeks)
10. Development of Embedded Vision-based and Multimedia Systems (3 weeks)
11. Final Project  (1 week)
scorePolicy:
Lab Practices & Reports: 55%
Two Term Projects: 45%
materials:
Reference Books:
1. Jean J. Labrosse, Jack Ganssle, Robert Oshana, Colin Walls, “Embedded Software”, Newnes, 2007.
2. B.I. Pawate, “Developing Embedded Software using DaVinci and OMAP Technology”, Morgan and Claypool, 2009.
3. Jasmin Blanchette, Mark Summerfield, “C++ GUI Programming with Qt4, 2/e”, Prentice Hall, 2008.
4. Bruce P. Douglass, “Real Time UML Workshop for Embedded Systems”, Newnes, 2007.
5. Open source Software Libraries (Source Forge, Open Foundry, Google Code…)
